mapper.sql: id, order_source, order_id, order_sn, order_time, modify_time, finish_time, order_emt, plus, compared, union_id, pid, sku_id, sku_name, sku_num, image_url, price, commission_rate, final_rate, estimate_cos_price, estimate_fee, actual_cos_price, actual_fee, status, uid, position_id
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_order(id, order_source, order_id, order_sn, order_time, modify_time, finish_time, order_emt, plus, compared, union_id, pid, sku_id, sku_name, sku_num, image_url, price, commission_rate, final_rate, estimate_cos_price, estimate_fee, actual_cos_price, actual_fee, status, uid, position_id) values
(#{entity.id},#{entity.orderSource}, #{entity.orderId}, #{entity.orderSn}, #{entity.orderTime}, #{entity.modifyTime},#{entity.finishTime}, #{entity.orderEmt}, #{entity.plus}, #{entity.compared}, #{entity.unionId},#{entity.pid}, #{entity.skuId}, #{entity.skuName}, #{entity.skuNum}, #{entity.imageUrl},#{entity.price}, #{entity.commissionRate}, #{entity.finalRate}, #{entity.estimateCosPrice}, #{entity.estimateFee},#{entity.actualCosPrice}, #{entity.actualFee}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.uid},#{entity.positionId})
on duplicate key update order_time = values(order_time), modify_time = values(modify_time), finish_time = values(finish_time), order_emt = values(order_emt), plus = values(plus), compared = values(compared), commission_rate = values(commission_rate), final_rate = values(final_rate), estimate_cos_price = values(estimate_cos_price), estimate_fee = values(estimate_fee), actual_cos_price = values(actual_cos_price), actual_fee = values(actual_fee), status = values(status), uid = values(uid)
